org.midica.ui.tablesorter

Class MidicaSorter<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowSorter<M>
      • javax.swing.DefaultRowSorter<M,java.lang.Integer>
        • javax.swing.table.TableRowSorter
          • org.midica.ui.tablesorter.MidicaSorter<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - type of the model (MidicaTableModel)
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageTableSorter

    public class MidicaSorter<M>
extends javax.swing.table.TableRowSorter

    This class provides a table row sorter and filter for tables used in Midica.

    The following sorting cycle is used:

    MODEL > ASCENDING > DESCENDING > MODEL > …

    Filtering is possible based on:

    • categories
    • strings
    • a combination of both
    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller
